# Getting Started

This guide will help you get started with dynamic-random-sampler.

## Prerequisites

- Python 3.12 or higher
- pip or uv package manager

## Installation

### Using pip

```bash
pip install dynamic-random-sampler
```

### Using uv

```bash
uv add dynamic-random-sampler
```

### From source

```bash
git clone https://github.com/DRMacIver/dynamic-random-sampler.git
cd dynamic-random-sampler
uv sync
```

## Basic Usage

```python
import dynamic_random_sampler

# Example usage
```
